message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $13,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $13,750. I'm confident this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, Alice. However, I am unable to meet your price of $13,750. My maximum offer remains at $13,000.
